name: Maze Again
description:
"Once outside, there is no come back" - Nobody

Maze again is a game done during the Ludum Dare 51 that I wanted to polish during October
and release a better game. It is actually the first game I created. 

____________________________________

How to play ?

Move : Arrow keys

Tag: Spacebar
